thread.title: Watch a Pro Skier Ski Without Snow
thread.title_full: Watch a Pro Skier Ski Without Snow

author: jnosek1
title: Watch a Pro Skier Ski Without Snow
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
It’s rare that a video will stop you in your tracks and actually provoke an audible gasp, but by our approximation, we breathlessly uttered “holy f**k!” at least six times while watching this clip of French pro skier Candide Thovex pulling off insane stunts for an Audi commercial. But wait , you say. I’ve seen tons of videos of skiers doing cool tricks, and plenty of car commercials. What could possibly be different about this one? Well, have you ever seen a skier speed down grass, dirt, gravel, a tunnel, and even a footbridge, and then fly over a tractor and land a backflip in a field of crops? No. No you haven’t. 
Thovex, a 34-year-old freeskiing sensation, has earned a reputation for taking the sport to new terrain. So Audi recruited him to do his thing in a commercial for its Quattro, presumably telling the daredevil that he could do whatever the hell he wanted so long as he landed in the open trunk of an Audi. After the Quattro clip became a viral hit , haters naturally said it was fake, prompting Thovex to unveil this behind-the-scenes footage from the shoot. Thovex’s stunts are decidedly not fake, haters, so please go try to ski without snow and see what happens before questioning the man’s craft. Advertisement
